descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Enter Bow Saber Wave Defense – the ultimate VR combat experience! Arm yourself with a bow for long-range shots and a saber sword for close-range defense as you face endless waves of fiery enemies. Challenge yourself to set a new high score as you master the art of survival.

	In Bow Saber Wave Defense, you’ll test your skills against relentless waves of fireballs. With each wave, the pace and intensity grow, pushing your reflexes, aim, and endurance to their limits. Can you rise to the top of the global leaderboard?

	Features:
		•	Dual-Weapon Combat: Use the bow for precision and the saber for close-up action.
	•	Endless Fireball Waves: Survive escalating waves and reach new high scores.
	•	High-Score Challenge: Beat your records and compete on the leaderboard.
	•	Immersive VR Gameplay: Feel the thrill of VR as you defend against fiery foes.

	Download Bow Saber Wave Defense and put your VR combat skills to the test!
